summary: Grove v0.9.7 brings a smarter, more connected experience. We've introduced a data-driven Help Center for your knowledge base, added new subscription management tools for administrators, and brought the beautiful new tree logo to life across the platform. This release also focuses on polish and stability, with numerous fixes for tests, images, and timezone handling to make everything run more smoothly for you.

features: implement data-driven Help Center with section icons and TOC

add Grove User Identity to knowledge base
